articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Researchers formulate 'golden rules' for controlling alignment of supermoiré lattices - Phys.org
articles.description: National University of Singapore (NUS) physicists have developed a technique to precisely control the alignment of supermoiré lattices by using a set of golden rules, paving the way for the advancement of next generation moiré quantum matter.
